name: Intro
_source: speak;EphraimSepia;Don't make that face.|We'll see each other again.|All three of us-you, me, and Eirika.
speak;LyonF;Yeah...|I know.|But when we get older, when we each take the reigns of our nations, we probably won't meet again...|Not like this, I mean.|Not as friends.
speak;EphraimSepia;What's that got to do with anything?|Kings are humans, too.|Emperors need not be friendless, you know.

speak;LyonF;I suppose you're right.|You have a knack for cutting to the heart of things.|But becoming a king or an emperor is not something you can take lightly.|I really don't think we'll be the same people we are right now...|What if Renais and Grado went to war?|What if we were forced to fight?
speak;EphraimSepia;Don't be ridiculous.|That would never happen.
speak;LyonF;If...|If it did...|We'd still be friends, wouldn't we?
speak;EphraimSepia;Even if that happens, yes.|We're friends forever.|Nothing can change that.|You'll see.
speak;LyonF;Hm...|All right, Ephraim.|Then I will see you again.
speak;Lyon;You came after all, Ephraim.|I'm glad.
speak;Ephraim;Lyon.|Is this...|Is this my fault?|Am I responsible for how much you've changed?|I haven't seen you for two years now...|Have you..hated me that entire time?

speak;Lyon;No, Ephraim.|I was never dishonest.|I liked you both.|I still do.|But I was envious of you, too.|That's why I...desired this.|You may not believe me when I tell you this, but...|Even now, after all this, I still consider you a friend.
speak;Ephraim;Lyon...|You know that I do, too.|I spoke the truth to you...|I truly thought that we would always be friends.|That's why I...|I have to stop you.

speak;Lyon;Of course. I know...|You are Ephraim, after all.|You could do no less, my friend.|Well, come then, Ephraim.|Try and stop me.|I will defeat you, and then I will save the people of Grado.|No one...|No one will stand in my way.
